title: Kinetic Proof: AI Governance Engine
lessonDescription: Start here. You will see how an AI decision moves from input to final outcome, with each checkpoint visible so nothing feels like a black box.
proof: An auditable governance engine where every decision stage is explicit and reproducible.
Users see why an action is approved, flagged, or blocked before moving forward.

title: VPN Cost Lab
lessonDescription: Builds on How AI Decisions Work. This lesson shows where cost appears in the same flow so you can compare speed, quality, and spend before launch.
proof: A practical cost-control simulator where spend, routing, and policy tradeoffs are visible immediately.
Operators can test governance-sensitive settings without breaking core flow logic.

title: Vibe â†’ PRAL
lessonTitle: Turn Ideas Into an Action Plan
lessonDescription: Builds on How Much This AI Costs. You will take a vague request and turn it into a clear plan with steps, ownership, and decision gates.
proof: A diagram-first pathway that turns fuzzy intent into PRAL-structured action decisions.
Each transition is validated against policy and explainability checkpoints.

title: The Kinetic Kitchen 2.0
lessonDescription: Builds on Turn Ideas Into an Action Plan. This lesson turns the plan into a repeatable workflow with routing, handoffs, and guardrails.
proof: A visual order-routing environment for workflow, routing, and escalation behavior.
Quality, throughput, and policy controls stay visible as each step evolves.

title: Kitchen X-Ray
lessonDescription: Builds on Build a Reliable AI Workflow. You will identify weak points early and see how to catch safety and policy issues before they escalate.
proof: A structured safety walkthrough that highlights role-level risks before they escalate.
Learners inspect transitions to identify policy failures and recovery actions.

title: Ghost Machine
lessonDescription: Builds on Spot Risk Before It Breaks. This lesson makes every state transition traceable so teams can audit what changed, when, and why.
proof: An evidence-first decision-state simulator that exposes transitions as auditable events.
Teams can justify recommendations by following each move from one state to the next.

title: Neural Glass
lessonTitle: Explain Why the AI Chose This
lessonDescription: Builds on Track Every State Change. You will connect model signals to outputs so stakeholders can understand and challenge decisions with evidence.
proof: A practical signal-to-decision walkthrough where confidence is explicit at each step.
Inputs, feature influence, and outputs stay linked for transparent challenge and review.

title: Policy Gatekeeper
lessonDescription: Builds on Explain Why the AI Chose This. This lesson adds clear policy rules, escalation paths, and stop conditions for operational control.
proof: A policy-routing lab that makes escalation, guardrails, and rule evaluation visible.
Decision outcomes are interpreted before execution, reinforcing operational control.

title: The AI Kitchen
lessonDescription: Builds on Set Rules and Escalation Paths. You will run a final readiness review that confirms controls, risk posture, and go-live confidence.
proof: A final readiness simulation that links control surfaces to deployment confidence.
The experience closes with a practical outcome map from decision trace to action.
